response.overview: A girl from small town married to 47 years old Businessman, Kabir and returns to India. Kabir, the man of his works and assignments involved many of his times in to it. Kabir with his good friend, Aarav also his manager in the office shows a very good bonding which plays an very vital role in this story. Samaira, lady of open minded and beauty settles with kabir at bungalow where she finds herself unsatisfied by her husband. Samaira in search of true love tries several times to make her husband close but she fails. Then the day arrives when Kabir proposed Samaira for wedding night where they first time goes for physical relationship.In the bungalow of Kabir with Samaira, there is 1 more character present, Raju, servant at home. Samaira in the story seen seduced by servant at washroom.
response.title: A Small Town Girl
